# invalidateSuggestedWorkouts()

**Type Method**

Tells the system when the list of suggested workouts changes.

## Declaration

```swift
static func invalidateSuggestedWorkouts()
```

## Discussion

Call this method when you change the value of the [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/StartWorkoutIntent/suggestedWorkouts] property.

## Defining supported workouts

- **WorkoutStyle**: The type to use for defining the intent’s workout style.
- **workoutStyle**: The workout style for the intent.
- **suggestedWorkouts**: A list of the supported workout styles.
